solution_line_template: There will be a total of {jessie} + {friends_invited} = <<{jessie}+{friends_invited}={total_people}>>{total_people} people who will share the muffins.
Each of them will have {total_muffins}/{total_people} = <<{total_muffins}/{total_people}={muffins_per_person}>>{muffins_per_person} muffins.
